channel.title: Smithing
channel.description: Does anyone have the code for proper smithing, I have it so that you get money.

item.title: Smithing
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

You will need to have a go at yourself, there is no tutorial on adding smithing no longer.
As I said, you need to add the code yourself, then any errors you have you post back here.

I suggest you read the section rules

Edit: 3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final

Read full topic

item.title: Smithing
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

You can easily edit it, give it a go and if you do get any errors post them back here.
You must have a go at your work before asking for help, if you are not going to do it yourself that’s lazy.

Edit: 3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.
